attributes.action: Don't approve the M1 bridge/ Development to Willen Village Milton Keynes
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.milton-keynes.gov.uk/planning-and-building/planning-policy/milton-keynes-east-development-framework?fbclid=IwAR3Pm_iSy7QVsnRZK-gf4oEJK4Biffy3CsOxXq_S6mXdf1ZYnaqaolvSyDQ

See 29th Jan -  M1 Bridge

Quotes from villagers:
https://www.ipetitions.com/petition/say-no-to-the-v11-willen-bridge#

Willen is a conservation area this bridge impeaches this
attributes.background: A proposed bridge over M1 onto the V11 Milton Keynes, this would create extra traffic onto the already busy V11 and excess noise and pollution that would affect the small village and hospice. The bridge has been proposed across conservation land the village strongly oppose this bridge and proposal

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Planning permission would be the responsibility of the local council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Alternatively you could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
